Package dbdiffchecker.sql

Class SQLiteConn

java.lang.Object
dbdiffchecker.DbConn
dbdiffchecker.sql.SQLDbConn
dbdiffchecker.sql.SQLiteConn
public class SQLiteConn
extends SQLDbConn
Establishes a connection with an SQL database based on the path to the database and database name.
Since:
5-5-19

  • Constructor Details

    • SQLiteConn

      public SQLiteConn​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String database, java.lang.String type) throws DatabaseDifferenceCheckerException
      Sets the instance variables and tests the database connection to make sure that the database can be reached.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the SQLite database.
      database - The SQLite database name that the connection is to be established with.
      type - Either 'dev' or 'live'.
      Throws:
      DatabaseDifferenceCheckerException - Error connecting to the database.
